articles.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 546.64 points, or 1.65%, to 33,674.38, the S&P 500 gained 75.03 points, or 1.85%, to 4,136.25 and the Nasdaq Composite added 269.02 points, or 2.25%, to 12,235.41.
articles.content: US stocks rallied on Friday, with the Dow posting its biggest one-day percentage gain since January 6, as shares of Apple surged more than 4% after upbeat results and US jobs data pointed to a resili… [+2526 chars]

articles.author: Writankar Mukherjee and Sagar Malviya
articles.title: From Apple to Crocs, India is driving numbers for large consumer MNCs - The Economic Times
articles.description: CEOs of global consumer-facing companies like Apple, Coca-Cola, Unilever, Mondelez, Yum! Brands, Mastercard, Pernod Ricard, Crocs, Skechers, and Whirlpool have reported strong resilience and growth in their India businesses. With China yet to recover to pre-C…
articles.content: Kolkata | Mumbai: Global chief executives of 10 large consumer-facing companies such as Apple, Coca-Cola, Unilever, Mondelez, Yum! Brands, Mastercard, Pernod Ricard, Skechers, Crocs and Whirlpool sai… [+4565 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Proton sales in April up 6.5% year-on-year - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Proton says sales in April totalled 9,415 units which took its total sales for the first four months of the year to 49,702 units.
articles.content:
PETALING JAYA: Proton says sales in April totalled 9,415 units which took its total sales for the first four months of the year to 49,702 units.
April sales grew by 6.5% year-on-year (y-o-y) while i… [+138 chars]
